entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
